text: The Unwanted Girl (Persian: Dokhtare sar rahi) is a 1953 Iranian film directed by Moezzodivan Fekri.Issari p.274 == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Iranian films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Moezzodivan Fekri
title: The Unwanted Girl
